Uses of Class
xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels.KernelFunction

  • Packages that use KernelFunction 
    Package Description
    xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.aggregates
    The package xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.aggregates provides several aggregate functions for nonparametric estimators.
    xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels
    The package xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels provides concrete kernels and abstract modellings.

    • Uses of KernelFunction in xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels

      Subclasses of KernelFunction in xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BiweightKernel
      This class models the Biweight kernel function.
      class  CosineArchKernel
      This class models the CosineArch kernel function.
      class  EpanechnikowKernel
      This class models the Epanechnikow kernel function.
      class  GaussianKernel
      This class models the Gaussian kernel function.
      class  TransformedKernelFunction
      This class provides a transformation of a one-dimensional kernel function with restricted support to [-1,1] like the epanechnikow kernel function or the biweight kernel function to an interval given by [l,l+c].
      class  TriweightKernel
      This class models the Triweight kernel function.
      class  UniformKernel
      This class models the Uniform kernel function.
      Fields in xxl.core.math.statistics.nonparametric.kernels declared as KernelFunction 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected KernelFunction ProductKernelFunction.kernel

      one-dimensional kernel function to transform to the given interval respectively support

      used kernel function for the estimators
      protected KernelFunction HybridKernelBasedBlockEstimatorAggregationFunction.kf
      used kernel function for the estimators
      protected KernelFunction AbstractKernelDensityEstimator.kf
      used kernel function for density estimation
      protected KernelFunction AbstractKernelCDF.kf
      used kernel function to estimate the density

      static double KernelBandwidths.computeBandWidth1D(int type, Object[] sample, KernelFunction kf, double var, double min, double max)
      Computes the bandwidth of a specified type for a given kernel estimator.
      static double KernelBandwidths.directNSPlugInRule2Stage(Object[] sample, int n, KernelFunction kf, double s)
      Computes a one-dimensional bandwidth for a kernel estimator based upon the 2-stage direct plug in rule using a normal kernel function for estimating the roughness of the plug-in values.
      static double KernelBandwidths.maximumLikelihoodCV(Object[] sample, KernelFunction kf, double h)
      Computes a one-dimensional bandwidth for a kernel estimator based upon the maximum likelihood cross validation.
      static double[] KernelBandwidths.maximumLikelihoodCV(Object[] sample, KernelFunction kf, double[] hs)
      Computes a d-dimensional bandwidth for a kernel estimator based upon the maximum likelihood cross validation.
      static double KernelBandwidths.normalScaleRule(int n, KernelFunction kf, double s)
      Computes a one-dimensional bandwidth for a kernel estimator based upon the normal scale rule.
      static double KernelBandwidths.oversmoothingRule(int n, KernelFunction kf, double s)
      Computes a one-dimensional bandwidth for a kernel estimator based upon the oversmoothing oder maximal principle rule.
